channel.title: AmiliusPvP 614 SPAWN&PK [Looking for Staff]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://s1.postimg.org/ocv56ht59/banner_1.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/315br6f.jpg[/img]
[CENTER][B][SIZE=5]Navigation [/SIZE][/B][/CENTER]
[URL=http://"amuliuspvp.co.uk"]WEBSITE[/URL] [URL=http://"godzrsps.co.uk/upload"]Community [FORUMS][/URL] [URL=http://"amuliuspvp.co.uk/client.jar"]PLAY][/URL]
====================
[B]AmuliusPvP[/B] Status ->[B][COLOR="#FF8C00"] Online[/COLOR][/B] [B]AmuliusPvP[/B] Revision -> [B][COLOR="#00FF00"]614[/COLOR][/B] [B]AmuliusPvP[/B] Type -> [B][COLOR="#0000FF"]PK with Spawn [/COLOR][/B]
=========================
[B][U]Server updates.[/U][/B]
[B]-Combat implemented Saradomin sword special Dragon battleaxe Special Dragon Scimitar Special Dharok formula fix Granite Maul Special some weps animations
-Clan Chat
-Cheat Client fixed -Fixed most unchecked interacting packets) -Client Issues(Account not getting disconnected Client null caused by missing opcodes) -Clanwars(Still the same of the older revision) -ObjectWalking Interaction(In progress)
[/B]
=========================
[B][U]Features[/U][/B] - Teleport Interface - Skull PvP Lvling System - Starter Interface - Custom Mage Arena Zone (No Range) - Thieving - Shops - PvP - Spawning/Selling - Dicing - Cash/Shard Eco - Commands - Magic - Custom Portals at Home - Custom Multi Donator Zone - Donator Ranks - Custom Names - Custom Levels - Custom Hit Splat (600+ Damage) - Fixed max cash stack resetting at 2147m - Godsword Specs - Safe PvP at Home - Unsafe PvP in other areas - Server Messages
========================
If you are interested in joining the development team, then please do follow this [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/requests/574634-amuliuspvp-614-developer-applications.html#post4710603"]link[/URL] to transfer you to the application thread.
===================================
MEDIA

[/CENTER]

[B][U]Server updates.[/U][/B]

[B]-Combat implemented
Saradomin sword special
Dragon battleaxe Special
Dragon Scimitar Special
Dharok formula fix
Granite Maul Special
some weps animations

-Clan Chat

-Cheat Client fixed
-Fixed most unchecked interacting packets)
-Client Issues(Account not getting disconnected
Client null caused by missing opcodes)
-Clanwars(Still the same of the older revision)
-ObjectWalking Interaction(In progress)

[/B]

=========================

[B][U]Features[/U][/B]

  • Teleport Interface
  • Skull PvP Lvling System
  • Starter Interface
  • Custom Mage Arena Zone (No Range)
  • Thieving
  • Shops
  • PvP

  • Magic
  • Custom Portals at Home
  • Custom Multi Donator Zone
  • Donator Ranks
  • Custom Names
  • Custom Levels
  • Custom Hit Splat (600+ Damage)
  • Fixed max cash stack resetting at 2147m

  • Safe PvP at Home
  • Unsafe PvP in other areas

========================

If you are interested in joining the development team, then please do follow this [URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/requests/574634-amuliuspvp-614-developer-applications.html#post4710603”]link[/URL] to transfer you to the application thread.
